original_title: President tables IMF agreement in Parliament
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe tabled the IMF agreement in Parliament, a short while ago.
The President also made the official announcement of receiving the IMF extended fund facility in Parliament.
He said in terms of the Foreign Loans Act, the finance ministry secretary was granted special permission to sign the necessary agreements with regard to the IMF Fund facility. (Ajith Siriwardana)
